description: Try our easy to follow Sweet & Sour Cherries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sweet & Sour Cherries Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Wash cherries and leave stalks on as they look much more attractive. Prick once or twice with a needle or thin skewer and place into a large bowl.
Tie cloves, ginger bruised, and cinnamon stick in a piece of muslin. Heat caster sugar, vinegar and spice bag in a saucepan until sugar dissolves.
Simmer for 20 minutes, then pour over cherries. Leave to stand at room temperature for 24 hours.
Drain off liquid into a saucepan, reheat and pour back over cherries. Leave to stand for another 24 hours.
Now, reheat cherries with the liquid, bringing it slowly to the boil. Bottle cherries with syrup, cover and seal.
